about_the_game:
The CATX company achieved a medical revolution. A drug called Catxone, technically a virus, was a magnificent product that cured all types of cancer and strengthened immunity. Humankind was celebrating great victories.

Here Is how the 6th Extinction Began.

After the great catastrophe, some of the survivors united and founded their own colonies. In this post-apocalyptic new world, humans were more dangerous than the dead. Formulate your own strategy and prove your leadership to them!

FOUND AND LEAD YOUR OWN COLONY

Create your own story with FPS and TPS gameplay modes. Are you a leader or a fearful civilian? Found, develop, and defend your colony against enemy colonies. Recruit new comrades to your camp and boost your defenses. Forge alliances with other colonies.

CAMP LIFE AND LEADERSHIP

Attract survivors to your camp. Build your community and assign tasks such as farming, animal husbandry, and resource gathering. Strive to keep everyone alive and happy in the post-apocalyptic world. Maintain balance in hunger, sleep, and certain psychological values.

ACTION-FUELED BATTLES

Battle against the undead and rival colonies. Seize enemy colonies and recruit their members into your own group (or, if you prefer, eliminate them all). Launch full-scale assaults either alone or with your team. Keep your colony safe from both the undead and other rival colonies.

SCENARIO AND OPEN WORLD

Start with the scenario initially. Once you become a bit more professional, you can determine the course of events yourself. Roam freely in the city, but be cautious around the undead and untrustworthy individuals.

Key Features:

  • A vast city map spanning 6 square kilometers.

  • Open-world exploration and freedom of movement.

  • Colony management: survival skills such as farming, animal husbandry, or resource gathering.

  • Adding numerous comrades to your camp.

  • AI that behaves logically and makes choices.

  • Dozens of enemy colonies to conquer.

  • Day-night cycle and hourly time system influencing events.

  • Four seasons and varied weather conditions including sunny and rainy.

  • Drivable vehicles.

  • Trust and reputation points.

  • Gameplay in FPS and TPS modes.

  • Some RPG elements.

  • Hunger, sleep, and certain psychological values.

  • The undead and enemy colonies.

  • Alliances.

  • Various weapons and ammunition.

  • Follow the scenario or create your own story.

  • And much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 7th, AMD Ryzen 1xxx series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs require additional 2GB of system RAM. These estimates may change in the final release.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th, AMD Ryzen 3xxx series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs require additional 2GB of system RAM. These estimates may change in the final release.

short_description: In a post-apocalyptic world, found and develop your own colony under the threat of the undead. Be cautious against enemy colonies or form alliances. Engage in action-fueled battles against the undead and other humans using FPS or TPS game modes. Formulate your strategy and survive!
